markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Wasp](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3233)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Giant wasps are much more dangerous but less common than their smaller kin, and—to the relief of those who encounter them—they tend to be solitary.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Giant_Wasp.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Giant Wasp](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3233)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 343 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +11, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +4

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 45

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
stinger +12 ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)),
**Damage** 1d12+4 piercing plus giant wasp venom

**Implant Eggs** <actions string="Single Action" />  The giant wasp lays eggs in an adjacent creature that is [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85) or [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95), exposing it to wasp larva disease.

**Giant Wasp Venom**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 19 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; Stage 1 no effect (1 round); **Stage 2** [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61) (1 round); **Stage 3** [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85) (1 round)

**Wasp Larva**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** DC 21 Fortitude; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1d6 days); **Stage 2** [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=68) (1d4 days); **Stage 3** 5d6 damage, larva emerges (disease ends)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-483" />
name: Giant Wasp
